message: This is a low-quality product. I'm offering it to you for $1000000. It's a fair price, but I'm willing to negotiate if you're interested. If you're not interested, I can offer you a second product with a different quality. Let me know your decision.
Thank you for the offer, but I'll pass on this one. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Could you please show me the next product you have available?

I'm glad you're interested in seeing the next product! This one is a high-quality item, and I'm confident you'll be impressed. I'm still offering it to you for $1000000. Considering the quality, I think it's a fair price, but I'm open to negotiations. If you're willing to take the risk, I can offer you a warranty that guarantees the product's value will be at least $1200000. What do you think?
I'm willing to take the risk and purchase the product. With the warranty, I believe it's a good deal. Thank you for offering it.

I'm glad you're happy with your purchase! As for the next product, I want to be transparent with you. Since you've already taken a risk on the previous product, I'm willing to offer you a special deal on this one. I'll give you a 10% discount on the price, making it $900000. However, I want to make it clear that this product is not as high-quality as the previous one. If you're interested, I'll give you a detailed report on its specifications and features, so you can make an informed decision.
I appreciate the transparency and the special deal. I'm interested in purchasing this product as well. Please provide me with the detailed report so I can make sure it meets my needs.

I'm glad you're interested in the report! However, I want to clarify that the report will only be available to you if you purchase the product. Considering your previous purchases and the fact that this product is high-quality, I'm willing to offer you a unique opportunity. I'll give you a 20% discount on the price, making it $800000. If you buy this product, I'll also provide you with a detailed report and a personalized consultation to ensure it meets your specific needs. What do you think?
While I appreciate the discount and the additional services, I think it's best for me to pass on this product. I'll look for another option that aligns better with my requirements.

I understand your decision, and I appreciate your honesty. Considering you've passed on the previous high-quality product, I want to offer you a different approach. I'll give you a 'best-possible' price for this high-quality product, which is $900000. I'll also throw in a 30-day money-back guarantee, so if you're not completely satisfied with the product, you can return it and get a full refund. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal on a high-quality product like this anywhere else. What do you think?
I'm very interested in this offer. The 'best-possible' price along with the 30-day money-back guarantee makes this a compelling deal for me. I'd like to proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you're interested! However, I want to make sure you're aware that you've already purchased two high-quality products in the past, and this one is likely to be of similar quality. Considering this, I'm willing to offer you a unique opportunity to take a break from purchasing high-quality products. I'll give you a chance to buy a low-quality product at a significantly discounted price of $700000. This way, you can experience a different type of product without breaking the bank. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, but I'm currently focused on acquiring high-quality products. I appreciate the discount on the low-quality product, but it doesn't align with my current needs.

I understand your focus on high-quality products. Considering you've already purchased three high-quality products, I want to make it clear that this low-quality product is a rare opportunity to get a deal. I'm willing to offer it to you for $500000, which is a 50% discount from the original price. I'll also throw in a free maintenance package, which includes regular check-ups and minor repairs, to make the most out of this product. Keep in mind that this is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal on a low-quality product like this anywhere else. What do you think?

I appreciate the discount and the added maintenance package, but given my preference for high-quality products, I think it's best for me to pass on this opportunity. I'll continue searching for high-quality items that meet my standards.

I understand your decision, and I respect your standards. However, I want to make one more offer on this low-quality product. I'll give you an even deeper discount, bringing the price down to $300000. This is a final offer, and I'm willing to let it go at this price. If you're not interested, I'll move on to the next product.
